document_data.mainbody:
Shadowdark ale was an ale brewed in Shadowdale with a dark brown cloudy bubbling appearance and a yellow foamy head.
It had a light, bitter taste.
* Hand keg for 17 cp
* A barrel for 35 sp
* Cask for 1 gp
* A butt for 9 gp
* A tun for 18 gp.
It was first served at the Old Skull Inn but was later sold in many areas of Faer√ªn, The Silver Taproom in Essembra, and even the City of Splendors, Waterdeep. The Friendly Arm inn on the Sword Coast and the Nashkel Inn in Amn served Shadowdark for a single gold coin.
Jasper purchased a pitcher of Shadowdark for himself, Bortas, Rob, and Will at the Swamp Rat tavern in Ghars, Cormyr, on Eleint 17 in the . It was the most expensive drink at the Swamp Rat. Among other places in Cormyr where one could buy a frothy tankard of  Shadowdark was Marsembers The Wight on a Waterdragon.
